revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=B-LINK |model=AP03 (KY669A) |revision= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=USB Female Mini-B |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |cpu1_brand= |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_usb_num= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |wi1_module=B-LINK AP03 Wireless Module |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT2070 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none= |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand=Supereal |eth_chip1_model=SR3211UB |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags=portable |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=KY669A-XXXXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^KY669A-[0-9A-F]{9}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.225 |default_user= |default_pass=111111111111 |tp_firmware= |oui=00:E0:4C |oui_eth=00:E0:4C }}The only significant chip on board is the Supereal SR3211UB (101301AF).
The manufacturer of this device appears to be '''B-LINK'''.
The unit is near identical to [http://www.oimai.net/article-641.html this pocket AP] (Syba I/O Crest SY-ADA24007, [http://www.dealextreme.com/p/portable-usb2-0-2-4ghz-54mbps-802-11b-g-wireless-wlan-router-ap-48684 on DX]) minus the RT2571W based module.
The device has two modes - AP mode and USB passthrough mode (where it acts as a plain old RT2070 based [ID 148f:2070] USB adapter).
[http://www.dealextreme.com/p/2-4ghz-54mbps-802-11g-b-wlan-wifi-wireless-usb-card-router-ap-45460 On DealExtreme?]
==Configuration==
111111111111 (13 1s) is the default WEP and HTTP administration key. The HTTP administration (single) page is accessible from the wireless side only with the WEP/admin key required to change unit settings.
The ability to change settings is extremely limited... *the SSID will always have the KY669A prefix *the channel can be set to 3, 6, 9, or 11 only *the WEP/admin key can be changed *the device IP can be changed
==Images== ===External=== <gallery> File:China AP03 top.jpg|top of the unit File:China AP03 back.jpg|back of the unit </gallery>[[Has images::external| ]] <gallery> File:China_AP03_angled_usb_switch.jpg|USB port and switch File:China AP03 angled ethernet reset.jpg|Ethernet port and reset button </gallery> ===Internal=== <gallery> File:China AP03 board top.jpg|board top File:China AP03 board bot.jpg|board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
